"（小さく）鼻歌～♪": "You didn't hear that just now, did you?"
"Not well enough to know what you were saying."
"I just thought I heard a voice up here."
"Oh, nah, I was practicing my singing."

"It's embarrassing to do it with other people around,
so I come here to do it in secret."
"I was practicing my singing."

"I thought I'd do it in secret where
nobody was around, but you found me."

"Ahhhh... Nadereh's singing
was beautiful, wasn't it?"

"She's that strong, AND can
sing that well? It's no fair."

"Hadi and the other performers
played so well too."
"So she inspired you to start singing?"
"So have you gotten any good at it?"

"Yeah. It looked like so much fun
when everyone was singing along."

"Mmm... Well, I'm
still practicing."

"It looked like so much fun when
everyone was singing along."

"Nadereh and I have started
talking quite a bit lately."
"We talked a lot about singing."

"I could really tell that she's just as serious about
her singing as she is with her martial arts."

"She's studied a bunch, like about different singing styles,
and how each of them convey a different feeling to the audience."

"Even when she stopped publicly singing when her Power of Song didn't appear,
she said she never stopped practicing by herself."

"She's a really
hard-working person."
"I think that's the reason why everyone supports her."

"Though, Manon once said something like
\"Nadereh's song doesn't affect people\"."

"I just know that when I hear that singing voice,
I feel this huge surge of motivation."

"Now that I think about it, the folks back in Aelio Town
all used to sing before something big was gonna happen..."

"Everyone would get together and sing and have a good time. After, everyone
would sleep like a rock, and be ready for battle the next day."

"Maybe songs just have that
effect on people naturally."

"Mmm... I just wish I had some sort of
ability to inspire people like that, you know?"

"Oh, right! So, I was
talking with Nadereh, right?"

"She let me come into her room, and
it was like... SUPER cutesy."

"She had a bunch of stuffed toys all lined up on
her bed, and one was like a pink Rappy plushy."

"Where would you even
get one of those?"

"Maybe it was made by
one of her lady's maids?"
"Or wait, maybe she made it herself...?"

"...Ahh, wait! Nadereh told me not
to tell anyone about her room!"
"Sorry, forget everything I just said!"
